content.question: Which of the following serves as an explanation for the differences between generations in voting patterns?

choices.label: Major political events affecting political attitudes
Changes in political party mobilization techniques

content.answer: Major political events affecting political attitudes

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain how the visual elements of the source (a cartoon, map, or infographic) illustrate or relate to political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
